text: oo * Makas up the majority of antibodies inserum * The only antibody that can cross the placenta from mother to fetus * Functions in opsonization, neutralization, and complemant fixation oA * Found in secrations such as braast milk and saliva * Functions in agglutination and > < neutralization oM * The first antibody secreted on ‘exposure to an antigen * Potent agglutinating and precipitating agent « Functions in complement fixation WE * Binds mast cells and basophils and triggers their degranulation, facilitating inflammation, particularly in the allergic response Wb * Antibody found exclusively on the surface of B calls « Hasarolein B call sensitzation and activation
